traits.desc:
Witch Abilities apply a curse to enemies for @CurseDuration@ seconds. When a cursed enemy dies, the curse spreads to the nearest enemy.

Cursed enemies become:

(@MinUnits@) smaller, losing @MaxHealthReduce@ of their max Health
(@MinUnits@) AND green, healing the lowest Health Witch for @CurseHealPct@% of damage taken
(@MinUnits@) AND frail, taking @TrueDamagePct@% bonus true damage from Witches
(@MinUnits@) AND a frog, stunned for @FrogPolymorphDuration@ seconds every @FrogPolymorphCooldown@ seconds. All other curse effects are increased by @ChaseIncreasePercent@%.
traits.name: Witchcraft

traits.desc:
Use the Arcana signifier item to choose a High Arcana champion. Each Arcana grants power based on a different condition.

Gain power for:
Ahri: Fielding 3-star champions.
Hecarim: Equipping items.
Tahm Kench: Activating traits.
Xerath: Purchasing Charms.
Emblem: Equipping Spatula items.
traits.name: Arcana

traits.desc:
Frost champions gain %i:scaleAP% Ability Power and %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage. The first few enemies to die become allied ice soldiers which lure enemy attacks if they are within range and retargeting.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusStats@ %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%, @NumStatues@ soldier
(@MinUnits@) @BonusStats@ %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%, @NumStatues@ soldiers
(@MinUnits@) @BonusStats@ %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%, @NumStatues@ soldiers, soldiers explode on death
(@MinUnits@) @BonusStats@ %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%, @NumStatues@ soldiers, explosion power doubles

Soldiers have @HealthPerStage@ Health per stage.
traits.name: Frost

traits.desc:
Hunters gain %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage, increased the first time they get a takedown each combat.

(@MinUnits@) @BaseAD@% %i:scaleAD%, @BonusADAfterTakedown@% after takedown
traits.name: Hunter

traits.desc: Norra summons Yuumi to help your team! She can be attached to allies by holding her over them. Yuumi shares her Ability Power with Norra and dies when Norra does.
traits.name: Best Friends

traits.desc: Wukong does not have a trait bonus, but instead has a powerful Ability and increased stats.
traits.name: Druid

traits.desc:
Scholars gain bonus Mana on attack.

(@MinUnits@) @ManaPerAttack@ %i:scaleMana% per attack
traits.name: Scholar

traits.desc:
Multistrikers' attacks have a chance to trigger @NumBonusAttacks@ extra attacks.

(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% chance
(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% chance
(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% chance; heal @OnHitHealPerc*100@% max Health every attack
(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% chance; heal @OnHitHealPerc*100@% max Health every attack
traits.name: Multistriker

traits.desc: When Morgana's bats kill an enemy, they have a @PercentChanceToAbduct@% chance abduct a 1-star copy of it.
traits.name: Bat Queen

traits.desc:
Warriors gain %i:scaleSV% Omnivamp and %i:scaleDA% Damage Amp. When Warriors drop below @HealthThreshold*100@% health, they gain double %i:scaleDA%.

(@MinUnits@) @Omnivamp*100@% %i:scaleSV%, @BonusDamage*100@% %i:scaleDA%
traits.name: Warrior

traits.desc:
Chronos gain @BaseAP@ Ability Power.

Combat start: begin a @Timer@ second countdown, which speeds up by @SecondsPerCast@ second after each Chrono Ability cast. At the end of the countdown, gain a special effect:

(@MinUnits@) Your team restores @MaxHealthHeal*100@% health; Chronos gain @BonusAP@ more %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) AND freeze time for @FreezeDuration@ seconds, Chronos keep fighting and gain @BonusAP@ %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) AND Chronos gain @BonusAS*100@% %i:scaleAS% and your team heals @TimeHeal*100@% Health instead
traits.name: Chrono

traits.desc:
Your team gains @TeamwideAP@ %i:scaleAP% Ability Power.

When Incantors attack or cast, all Incantors gain stacks of %i:scaleAP% up to @MaxStacks@. Every other attack grants @StacksPerAttack@ stack, and each Ability cast grants @StacksPerCast@ stacks.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusAPPerStack@ %i:scaleAP% per stack
traits.name: Incantor

traits.desc:
(1) Ascendant Charms can appear in your shop. The odds increase by @PercentageChancePerPlayerCombat@% after player combat, up to @MaxPercentageChance@%. When you buy one, the odds reset.

Current Odds: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_AscendantOdds@%
traits.name: Ascendant

traits.desc:
Faeries gain Health and create special items that become stronger with trait tiers.

Choose a queen with the Faerie Crown which grants %i:scaleDA% Damage Amp. Choose a loyal guard with the Glamoured Armor which grants healing based on the queen's damage.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, Crown @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, Crown @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, Crown @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA% and gain Armor
(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%, Crown and Armor become Radiant

Only Faeries can hold Faerie items.
traits.name: Faerie

traits.desc: After combat, Milio has a 40/60/100% chance to convert a temporary relic component into a real component.
traits.name: Relic

traits.desc:
Your team heals for a percent of their max Health every @Duration@ seconds. If they're full Health, restore Mana instead.

Preservers gain double the amount.


(@MinUnits@) @HealthPct*100@% %i:scaleHealth% or @ManaPct*100@% %i:scaleMana%
traits.name: Preserver

traits.desc:
Vanguards gain @DamageReductionPct*100@% Durability while Shielded.

Combat start and at @HealthThreshold*100@% Health: Gain a Shield for a percent of max Health for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldPercentAmount*100@% max Health
traits.name: Vanguard

traits.desc:
When your team loses @HealthRatio*100@% of their Health, an Old God awakens. It gains @PercentHealthPerStarLevel*100@% Health and @APPerStarLevel*100@% Ability Power for each Eldritch star level.

(@MinUnits@) The Tainted Golem
(@MinUnits@) The Dark Monolith
(@MinUnits@) The Many-Eyed Beast
(@MinUnits@) The Stormbringer
traits.name: Eldritch

traits.desc:
Shapeshifters gain bonus max Health. After their first Ability cast, they triple this effect.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealthRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth%
traits.name: Shapeshifter

traits.desc:
Blasters gain %i:scaleDA% Damage Amp, which increases for @Duration@ seconds after casting their Ability.

(@MinUnits@) @BaseDamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%; @DamageAmpAfterCasting*100@% during burst
traits.name: Blaster

traits.desc:
Your team gains @TeamwideResists@ Armor and Magic Resist.

Bastions gain more, and the value doubles in the first @Duration@ seconds of combat.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR% and @NumUnits@ champions starting combat in the back 2 rows are invulnerable until 4 Bastions die
traits.name: Bastion

traits.desc: Briar gains %i:scaleDA% @DamageAmpPerHealth*100@% Damage Amp for each player health you are missing. Each round, gain a Light Snack to give her <scaleHealth>@BriarHealthGain@ %i:scaleHealth%</scaleHealth> in exchange for @TacticianHealthToFeed@ of your player health.
traits.name: Ravenous

traits.desc:
(@MinUnits@) Dragon attacks and Abilities @BurnPercent@% Burn and Wound enemies for @BurnWoundDuration@ seconds.
(@MinUnits@) The power of friendship upgrades all dragon Abilities!

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
traits.name: Dragon

traits.desc:
Honeymancers gain Bees that deal magic damage to their target every @Period@ seconds. Each Bee deals @BonusDamage*100@% of the Honeymancer's damage dealt and @DamageReceived*100@% of their damage taken.

When a Honeymancer dies, leave 1 Bee that follows nearby Honeymancers for the rest of combat.

(@MinUnits@) @MiniCount@ Bees
(@MinUnits@) @MiniCount@ Bees
(@MinUnits@) @MiniCount@ Bees, @NumTransfers@ Bees survive instead
traits.name: Honeymancy

traits.desc:
Combat start: Portal champions Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

Objects from other dimensions fly out of a portal every few seconds to help allies and disrupt enemies. The portal becomes @IncreasePerStarLevel*100@% stronger for each Portal champion's star level.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield, Small portal
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield, Medium portal
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield, Large portal
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield, GIGA portal
traits.name: Portal

traits.desc:
Mages cast their Abilities twice and have modified total Ability Power.

(@MinUnits@) @APMultiplier*100@% Ability Power
traits.name: Mage

traits.desc:
Sugarcrafters build a layer cake from sugar. Gain sugar for each component your team is holding after player combat.

They gain Attack Damage and Ability Power, increased by @BonusRatio*100@% for each cake layer. When the cake has reached @MaxLayers@ layers, gain treats instead!

Total: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_Pastry_BonusStats@ %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
Layers: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_Pastry_NumLayers@ / @MaxLayers@

(@MinUnits@) @SugarMultiplier@ sugar, @BaseAPAD@%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @SugarMultiplier@ sugar, @BaseAPAD@%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @SugarMultiplier@ sugar, @BaseAPAD@%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%, team gains @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%
traits.name: Sugarcraft

traits.desc:
Your team gains @BaseASPct@% %i:scaleAS% Attack Speed. Pyro champions gain more %i:scaleAS% and execute enemies under @ExecutePct@% Health.

For each kill, Pyro champions create an infernal cinder that you collect the next round. For every @NumCinders@ cinders you collect, your team gains @ASPctPerNumCinders@% more %i:scaleAS%.

(@MinUnits@) @PyroUnitAS@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @PyroUnitAS@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @PyroUnitAS@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @PyroUnitAS@% %i:scaleAS% and execute under @ExecutePct@% Health

Cinders collected: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_PyroCindersCollected@
Team %i:scaleAS%: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_PyroAttackSpeed@%
traits.name: Pyro

ability.desc: Place a bomb on the target, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedInitialDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and <TFTKeyword>Stunning</TFTKeyword> them for @StunDuration@ seconds. When the stun ends or the target dies, the bomb explodes, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target and <magicDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Time Bomb

ability.desc:
Fire a shard of ice at the target that pierces through enemies hit, dealing @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage, reduced by @FalloffDamage*100@% for each enemy hit. Targets are Sundered for @SunderDuration@ seconds.

Sunder: Reduce Armor
ability.name: Ice Shard

ability.desc:
Passive: Permanently gain @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_WarwickASAmountToGain@% Attack Speed and movement speed for each enemy killed. Attacks heal for @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health and deal @BonusOnAttackDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) bonus physical damage. Gain double the healing and physical damage for targets below @HealthThreshold*100@% Health.

(Current Bonus: +@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_WarwickBonusAS@% Attack Speed and movement speed)
ability.name: Ravenous Hunter

ability.desc: Paint a lightning bolt striking the target. A moment later the bolt strikes, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedBoltDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target and <magicDamage>@ModifiedAreaDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies. Every 3rd cast, paint @NumExtraBolts@ extra bolts on the lowest percent Health enemies.
ability.name: Subject: Storm

ability.desc:
Dash within @DashRangeInHexes@ hexes to hit the most enemies possible and heal for @ModifiedBonusSnowHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%). Excess healing becomes a @ShieldDuration@ second Shield. Then, deal @ModifiedInnerRingDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies and @ModifiedOuterRingDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies @SpellRadiusInHexes@ hexes away.

Every @SnowfallCasts@ casts create a snowfall that Chills all enemies and heals all allies for @ModifiedSnowHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%) over @HealDuration@ seconds. Excess healing also becomes a @ShieldDuration@ second Shield.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 20%
ability.name: Snowfall

ability.desc: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies and gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedBonusResists@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Armor and Magic Resist for @Duration@ seconds. During this time, attacks deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedBonusDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor% %i:scaleMR%)</magicDamage> bonus magic damage.
ability.name: Grandmaster-At-Arms

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds, increased by @ShieldInc*100@% for each enemy targeting Vex. When it expires, deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedBaseDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.
ability.name: Personal Space

ability.desc:
Passive: Fly around and attack the nearest enemy.

Active: Gain @BonusAttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed and replace Smolder's attacks with fireballs that deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage for @SpellDuration@ seconds.

Dragon Upgrade: Each fireball also heals @Heal@ Health.
ability.name: Learning to Fly

ability.desc: Attach a temporal rift to the target and the closest unaffected enemy that deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage over @RiftDuration@ seconds. Reset the duration of all other rifts on the enemy. If they die while affected, the rift explodes into stardust and heals adjacent allies for <scaleHealth>@PercentHealthHeal*100@%</scaleHealth> of their max Health.
ability.name: Borrowed Time

ability.desc:
Passive: On target death, hookshot to the lowest percent health enemy within @HookshotHexRange@ hexes and deal @IsolationZoneDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. After a hookshot or Ability cast, the next attack deals @TrueDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) true damage.

Active: Knock back and Stun enemies adjacent to the target for @StunDuration@ seconds, dealing @IsolationZoneDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. Create a containment zone around the target for @IsolationDuration@ seconds. Gain @ZoneDamageReduction*100@% Durability and @ZoneBonusAD*100@% Attack Damage while in the zone.
ability.name: Temporal Anomaly

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Honey Barrier

ability.desc:
Transform into a spider, replace this Ability with Petrifying Venom, then cast it.

Petrifying Venom: Stun the target for @StunDuration@ seconds and deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to them. Heal for @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%).
ability.name: Spider Form

ability.desc:
Transform into hammer form and gain @ModifiedResistGain@ (%i:scaleAP%) Armor and Magic Resist. Replace this Ability with Hammer Slam and immediately cast it.

Hammer Slam: Leap to the target, dealing @Damage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage.
ability.name: Hammer Form

ability.desc: For the next @Duration@ seconds, attacks instead deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

ability.desc:

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_Syndra_CastUpgrade1@ Casts: Enemies adjacent to the target are Shredded and take @ModifiedAOEDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.
@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_Syndra_CastUpgrade2@+ Casts: For every @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_Syndra_CastUpgrade2@ casts, create an additional rift that deals deals @ExtraOrbDamageModifier*100@% damage.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

ability.desc:
Bite the target, healing for @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%), dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage, and Chilling them for @ChillDuration@ seconds.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 20%

ability.desc:
Blink to the largest group of enemies within @BlinkHexRange@ hexes and spin, dealing @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage over @Duration@ seconds to enemies within @DamageHexRange@ hexes and Wounding them for @WoundDuration@ seconds. The @BonusEnemyCount@ nearest enemies take @ModifiedAdditionalDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage instead.

If she kills an enemy, blink and reposition again.

ability.desc: For @Duration@ seconds, gain <TFTBonus>@AttackSpeed*100@%</TFTBonus> decaying Attack Speed and her attacks deal <trueDamage>@BonusDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</trueDamage> bonus true damage. Takedowns refresh this effect for @ResetDuration@ seconds.

Active: Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the target.

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield that decays over @ShieldDuration@ seconds and slam the target, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedSlamDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage in a 2-hex line. (Bonus Health: +@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_BriarHealthFed@ Health)

zaps.desc: Next combat: @NumToGive@ champion without items gain an Unstable Treasure Chest.

zaps.desc: A random champion holding 3 completed items gains @HPToGain@ Health permanently.
zaps.name: Leadership

zaps.desc: Summon a Sentinel with an emblem of your most active trait for 1 round.
zaps.name: Summon Sentinel

zaps.desc: Next combat, gain a copy of a component from the first enemy with items your team kills.
zaps.name: Sticky Fingers

zaps.desc: This round, the next champion you buy is free.
zaps.name: Discount

zaps.desc: Reroll your shop with all Zaps. You can buy one this round, which casts twice.
zaps.name: The Magician

zaps.desc: Gain an Artifact anvil.
zaps.name: Conjure Artifact

zaps.desc: Next combat: Your Eldritch Old God is summoned immediately.
zaps.name: Ancient Ritual

zaps.desc: Planning only: A 4-cost champion you have transforms into a 5-cost.
zaps.name: Major Polymorph

zaps.desc: Reroll your Shop with all 3-cost champions.
zaps.name: All Threes

zaps.desc: Your team gains @PercentAS*100@% Attack Speed for 1 round.
zaps.name: Rite of Speed

zaps.desc: At @DelayTime@ seconds, your team gains @DamageAmpPercent@% Damage Amp.
zaps.name: Ultra Ascension

zaps.desc: You and your next opponent gain @GoldToGain@ gold.
zaps.name: Truce

zaps.desc: Gain @StepsToGain@ progress on your Sugarcraft cake.
zaps.name: Piece of Cake

zaps.desc: Next combat: Get a 1-star copy of the first enemy champion to die.
zaps.name: Copycat

zaps.desc: Gain a Champion Duplicator.
zaps.name: Major Mimicry

zaps.desc: Next combat: Gain an item component if you win in under @DelayTime@ seconds.
zaps.name: Quick Bounty

zaps.desc: Reroll your Shop with all 5-cost champions.
zaps.name: All Fives

zaps.desc: Next combat: Deal 10% max Health as true damage to all enemies.
zaps.name: Lightning Strike

zaps.desc: Next combat: Dragon attacks deal @PercentBurn*100@% target's max Health as bonus true damage.
zaps.name: Spitfire

zaps.desc: Next combat: Gain @Gold@ gold. If your opponent also bought this, lose @HealthLoss@ player health instead.
zaps.name: Greedy Dilemma

zaps.desc: Next combat: @NumUnits@ champs without items gain @NumToGive@ Unstable Treasure Chests.
zaps.name: Treasure Party

zaps.desc: Gain a Masterwork Upgrade.
zaps.name: Masterwork

zaps.desc: Next combat: Champions in the back 2 rows gain @BonusRange@ Attack Range.
zaps.name: Scope Expansion

zaps.desc: Your team gains @HealthBoost@ %i:scaleHealth% for every @GoldPerBoost@ gold you have for 1 round.
zaps.name: Golden Armor

zaps.desc: Gain @InitialHeal@ player health. If you lose your next player combat, gain @OnLossHeal@ more.
zaps.name: Comfort Food

zaps.desc: Reroll your Shop with champions 1 cost lower.
zaps.name: Dehance

zaps.desc: Reroll your Shop with all 2-cost champions.
zaps.name: All Twos

zaps.desc: Refresh your Shop with all 1-cost champions.
zaps.name: All Ones

zaps.desc: Reroll your Shop with a 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 cost champion.
zaps.name: The Count

zaps.desc: Next combat: @NumUnits@ random units in your back row are untargetable for @Duration@ seconds.
zaps.name: Stealthy

zaps.desc: 50% chance to gain 1 gold for each Coin Flip you've used.
zaps.name: Coin Flip

zaps.desc: Next combat: Time champions gain 30% more Attack Speed when the countdown completes.
zaps.name: Quickening

zaps.desc: Your High Arcana champion gains @BuffAmount*100@% Damage Amp and Durability for 1 round.
zaps.name: Supreme Arcana

zaps.desc: Gain a dummy for 1 round. Your dummies drop gold as they take damage.
zaps.name: Golden Blessing

zaps.desc: Next combat: Your team gains @Armor@ Armor.
zaps.name: Shield Wall

zaps.desc: Gain a Magnetic Remover and a Reforger. They vanish at the end of the round.
zaps.name: Gear Swap

zaps.desc: Next combat: @ShredSunder@% Shred and Sunder all enemies for @Duration@ seconds.
zaps.name: Dress Down

zaps.desc: Any champions you bench this turn have items removed and broken apart.
zaps.name: Salvager

zaps.desc: Summon a @Health@ Health Dragon for 1 round.
zaps.name: Summon Dragon

zaps.desc: Next combat: Stun all enemies for 2 seconds.
zaps.name: Earthquake

zaps.desc: Next combat: The first @MaxSpawn@ frontline units that die spawn a small Voidling.
zaps.name: Spawn Swarm

zaps.desc: Next combat: All your 1-star champions star up. Other champions gain @Shield@ Shield and @AP@ Ability Power.
zaps.name: The Star

zaps.desc: Gain a temporary emblem of your most active trait for 1 round.
zaps.name: Phantom Emblem

zaps.desc: Next combat: Burn and Wound enemies for @Duration@ seconds.
zaps.name: Sunfire Sorcery

zaps.desc: Gain a temporary Bramble Vest for 1 round.
zaps.name: Phantom Vest

zaps.desc: Your Bees gain @BonusAS*100@% Attack Speed this round.
zaps.name: Busy Bees

zaps.desc: Next combat: Witches gain 20 Ability Power.
zaps.name: Hocus Pocus

zaps.desc: Next combat: Add @StreakAdjust@ to your streak.
zaps.name: Hot Streak

zaps.desc: Gain @NumGloves@ temporary Thief's Gloves for 1 round.
zaps.name: Guild of Thieves

zaps.desc: Next combat: Your team's physical damage is dealt as magic damage
zaps.name: Paragon

zaps.desc: Lose @HPToLose@ player health. Gain @NumRerolls@ Shop rerolls that last until used.
zaps.name: Sinister Shop

zaps.desc: Gain @NumGold@ gold. Next combat: Your team gains @HPToGain@ Health.
zaps.name: Lucky Find

zaps.desc: Reroll your Shop with all 4-cost champions.
zaps.name: All Fours

zaps.desc: Next combat: @NumItems@ champions without items gain a completed item for 1 round.
zaps.name: Scrappy
